rooms.description: A spacious lobby with a north-facing entrance aligned according to Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow and wheelchair accessibility. Features include wide doorways and ramps.
A spacious living room designed with Brutalist style aesthetics, featuring exposed concrete surfaces and minimalist furniture. Large windows ensure natural light.
A functional kitchen with modern Brutalist fixtures, energy-efficient appliances, and an open-plan layout that connects to the dining area.
An integrated dining space adjoining the kitchen with a minimalist design, ensuring ample space for wheelchair maneuverability.
A well-lit guest bedroom designed with simplicity and functionality, featuring a private ensuite and accessibility features.
A second guest bedroom that mirrors the first in size and style, ensuring consistency in design and comfort for visitors.
A modern bathroom integrated with necessary accessibility features such as grab bars, non-slip tiles, and adjustable fixtures.
A compact storage space for household utilities and cleaning supplies, designed in a minimalist style.

openings.description: A wide north-facing entrance door aligned with Vastu principles for positive energy flow, featuring a ramp.
A large window on the south wall to maximize natural light in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
Standard interior doorways ensuring smooth flow and accessibility throughout the ground floor.

rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom featuring a private balcony, ample natural light, and wheelchair accessibility features.
A dedicated home office designed with Brutalist aesthetics, offering a quiet environment for work and ample natural light from north-facing windows.
A private gym area designed with functional space, equipped with necessary fitness equipment and accessible to wheelchair users.

openings.description: A north-east oriented balcony for the master bedroom, designed in compliance with Vastu principles.
An accessible central staircase connecting both floors, featuring handrails and gradual inclines suitable for wheelchair users.
